alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Palo Duro Canyon; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 4:31PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Armstrong and southern Randall Counties through 515 PM CST... At 431 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Happy, or 14 miles south of Canyon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canyon, Wayside, and Palo Duro Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
